exception.name: INRIA QPL 1.0 2004 variant exception
exception.notes: This exception is primarily used with QPL-1.0-INRIA-2004

text.p: As a special exception to the Q Public License, you may develop application programs, reusable components and other software items that link with the original or modified versions of the Software and are not made available to the general public, without any of the additional requirements listed in clause 6c of the Q Public license.
